system.description:
You have principles and you have a singularly powerful magic item that is bonded to you. It is unlikely that your life will be an unremarkable one. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength or wielder spellcasting ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your herald levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.b6bbf481xmj9mi6u]{Extra Attack} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iq8cqiia40rs54os]{Spellsword} features.
  • Half your wielder levels count as herald levels for the purpose of determining the damage of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite} and gaining access to the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u220f22b3cpphtgb]{Empowered Smite} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.p9gkawegqqbxb821]{Greater Empowered Smite} features.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in herald, 3 levels in wielder
